name: Quick Fill App
desc: A versatile Chrome extension designed to automate form filling tasks. Built with JavaScript and spring boot framework.

name: Portfolio
desc: Personal portfolio website. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Employee Leave System
desc: A web application with role-based access control, built using Angular and Spring Boot. It features secure authentication, leave tracking.

name: Angular Api App
desc: An Angular app that fetches and displays user data from a public API in a dynamic table, with client-side CRUD operations for efficient data management.

name: Spring Rest App
desc: RESTful web application using Spring Boot to perform CRUD operations, integrated with MySQL for data storage
